item.title: Translation Support
item.description: You can translate Minimo in your own language! For example, if you want to translate Minimo in Spanish, you will have to add this to your site’s config file: defaultContentLanguage = "en" [languages] [languages.es] lang = "es" languageName = "Spanish" weight = 1 Then create a folder named /i18n/ in your site’s root. And create a file /i18n/es.toml with the translated strings. For reference format you can see the en.
